QuestData.Title: Stand Tall, Captain!
QuestData.Description: Well, well, well... still alive I see. That's good, because Mor'ghor has requested your presence in his tower at once. Get a move on!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Overlord Mor'ghor at Dragonmaw Base Camp in Shadowmoon Valley.
QuestData.RewardText: <Mor'ghor nods.>$B$BThat's right, I said captain. You've earned another promotion, $N.$B$BYou certainly don't work like any fel orc I've ever seen. Keep this up and you might make overlord some day.$B$BNow get out there and take command. I would suggest you try and earn your Skybreaker wings.
